entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending early this evening then mainly cloudy. Risk of freezing drizzle early this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 6 this evening. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 28 December 2022
